turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey there James, could you get me a Golden Cafee Latte from Peet's?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, which store?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The Peet's on 1441 NE Broadway in Portland.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. What size did you want?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A small is fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What kind of milk did you want in it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Coconut milk will do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else you want added to your drink?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, bring me two or three of the honey sticks that have at the counter.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will do. Anything else you need?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Glad you asked. Can you be sure to sprinkle some cinnamon on top of my drink?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Absolutely. Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. If there's no coconut milk, ask for oat milk. If there's no oat milk, almond milk. Got it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yes ma'am. Anything else I should know?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I have an account at Peet's already, so you don't need a credit card. I almost forgot. Can you bring some packets of that raw cane sugar too?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: For sure. So just to recap, you want a Golden Caffe Latte with coconut milk. If there's no coconut milk, oat milk. If there's no oat milk, almond. I'll also bring 2 or 3 honey sticks and several packets of raw cane sugar. Did I forget anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: While you're at it, pick up a small ice green tropical tea. Just tea, no sugar or anything extra. Feel free to grab something for yourself.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alrighty. So that would be a Golden Caffe Latte and a ice tropical green tea, both smalls. Coconut milk in the latte, extra honey sticks and raw cane sugar packets on the side.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Done. I've just ordered both beverages at the 1441 NE Broadway location in Portland. It will be ready for pickup soon. Your receipt will be sent to your cell phone via text message.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks again James!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. Bye!
